```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r reading in data}
final_gun_violence_data <- readRDS("final data/final_data.rds")
```

# David suggested I compare LA to Boston but my data doesn't back up 
# that there's a large difference in gun violence in the two cities.

```{r}
final_gun_violence_data %>%
  filter(state == "Massachusetts") %>%
  filter(city_or_county == "Boston") %>%
  nrow()
```

```{r}
final_gun_violence_data %>%
  filter(state == "California") %>%
  filter(city_or_county == "Los Angeles") %>%
  nrow()
```
